sources.title: Haunting Sarah | FULL MOVIE | 2005 | Horror, Supernatural
sources.description:
Heather Lord is convinced that the spirit of her dead son is being reborn when her twin sister Erica discovers she’s pregnant. Erica’s young daughter Sarah, haunted by apparitions, claims to know the boy’s real and terrifying motives.

Kim Raver, Niamh Wilson, Alison Sealy-Smith, Rick Roberts, Ryland Thiessen, Gord Tanner

2005
Directed by Ralph Hemecker

metadata.Plot: As a mother (Raver) deals with the death of her young son, she learns that her niece is being contacted by the boy from beyond the grave.
metadata.Writer: Tony Phelan, Joan Rater, Lisa Grunwald
metadata.Actors: Kim Raver, Alison Sealy-Smith, Rick Roberts
